name: dd
summary: The `<dd>` HTML element provides the description, definition, or value for the preceding term (dt) in a description list (dl).
tagOmission: The start tag is required. The end tag may be omitted if this element is immediately followed by another `<dd>` element or a dt element, or if there is no more content in the parent element.
permittedParents: A dl or a div that is a child of a dl.This element can be used after a dt or another dd element.

nowrap.name: nowrap
nowrap.summary: If the value of this attribute is set to `yes`, the definition text will not wrap. The default value is `no`.
